title: New Surface Go 3 configuration gets you 4G LTE for under $500
content:
Back in October, Microsoft announced the Surface Go 3 alongside the Surface Laptop Studio and Surface Pro 8. It might have flew under the radar a bit, because while the other devices that were announced got redesigns, the Surface Go 3 was just a spec bump. Like its predecessor, it starts at $399, getting you

The post New Surface Go 3 configuration gets you 4G LTE for under $500 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft is producing a new configuration of the Surface Go 3 with a Pentium Gold and 4GB RAM, but it has 4G LTE for under $500.
